description:
Welcome to the classic brick breaker game! Shoot and break bricks and become the ball master! Keep up with the bouncing ball and deflect it with your paddle in this classic breakout game! Join the brick world and enjoy all the different challenges and puzzles that await you!

This game is easy to play, but difficult to master â€” try to achieve 3 stars on each level!

Game Features:
- Classic brick breaker breakout gameplay!
- Tons of unique puzzles full of fun and amazing challenges!
- Use power boosters to pass harder levels!
- Easy to play, difficult to master!
name: Brick Breaker Ball Shooter
